API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based prototype.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based prototype.

OWNER_NAME.description: Owners name to be displayed in alive command.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the Heroku app name here (Must an exact same name with your input above).

SUDO_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Gladiators support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours.

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Gladiators support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Message to be displayed in alive command.

ALIVE_MEDIA.description: Telegraph link of pic/gif/video to be displayed in alive command.
